snippet.title: Tiny Gets Seriously Spooked by Halloween Sam - Movie Stop Motion Animation Cartoons
snippet.description:
Tiny Gets Seriously Spooked by Halloween Sam - Movie Stop Motion Animation Cartoons
Tiny throws a Halloween gala where no one dresses up, except Sam.
#WOAVIDEOS #trickortreat #halloweencandy #StopMotion #Animation #Claymation #Tiny #Handmade #WOASTOPMOTION #CLAYMIXER

0:00 Clay Mixer
0:08 Trick 'r Treat
2:15 Forever Love
4:19 Hi There, Reaper!
6:04 The Weird Contract
9:02 Quack

See more of Clay Mixer: https://bit.ly/2X0l0ss

About Clay Mixer:
Tiny, the character who was named due to his significantly small figure. His idealistic shape was born from a real clay mixer. Even though having a poor and rusted personal background, he finds for himself the sense of humor with the help from many other clay friends to get through daily silly struggles. With the help from them, Tiny will get through daily silly moments. 6 days per week, Tiny appears again to tell the audience the stories.
All episodes are made under the use of stop motion animation technique and owned by SCONNECT CO., LTD., audiojungle.net and licenced under Creative Commons Attribution.
Please don‚Äôt worry about the joke that our little characters do with each other. The channel aims for high ages of viewers from 15 above with slightly sarcastic black comedy. There is no actual or physical harm was caused in the video. We hope you would like the videos and get used to all those tough practical joke of these characters.
All of our contents serve for entertainment purposes only and we don‚Äôt recommend to follow or imitate any action in our contents.
https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
Artist: https://artlist.io/
---------------------

CREDIT

Director - Thuy Cao
Scriptwriter - Quynh Ha
Storyboard - Minh Cao
Prop & Character Design - Phuong Hoang, Hang Do, Diep Ha, Vinh Tuong and Phuong Nguyen
Animator - Phong Le, Nhung Ho, Dung Pham and San Le
Compositor - Anh Pham and Hoang Nguyen
System Developer - Bach Cao
